QuestData.Title: Enough with the Bombs!
QuestData.Description: The Sunreavers have planted tactical mana bombs around our camp. These must be dismantled before they are detonated.$b$bLook for them in areas of high importance such as our supplies. Make sure you find and disable them all. We cannot afford to lose any ground here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disarm the Tactical Mana Bombs at the Alliance Ships, the Construct Ritual, and the Supplies within Violet Rise.

Objectives.Objective: Construct Ritual Tactical Mana Bomb disarmed
